official_title: To validate conveyances of certain lands in the State of California that form part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Central Pacific Railway Company.

summary.text: Validates specified land conveyances in Nevada and San Joaquin Counties, California, for lands forming parts of the right-of-way granted by the United States to named railroad.

titles.title: To validate conveyances of certain lands in the State of California that form part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Central Pacific Railway Company.
